subject: docs(guide): add connection labels and properties guidance
body:
The guide listed labels and properties as required connection fields
but gave no guidance on when to use them. AI assistants defaulted to
empty arrays/objects with no understanding of what could go there.

Adds "Connection labels and properties" subsection under Connection
naming with:
- Three-field breakdown (title, labels, properties) mirroring item
  guidance but adapted for relationship semantics
- "When to use" tables for labels and properties with concrete examples
- Rule of thumb for deciding whether data belongs on the connection
  or on one of its endpoint items
- Note that connection labels/properties are JSON-only (Markdown
  auto-generates connections without metadata)

Tags: docs, ai-guide, import, connections
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: fix-import-compatibility
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GmBxqTbwGYpy2GUF4TGDLk
title: add connection labels and properties guidance
